Posts.Content: Jul 7, 2009 03:23PM EliseChampe wrote: You might want to look at sun sleeves which lets you wear short sleeves but with a little more flexibility. And they cover the hands.  I personally use the eclipse glove, which seems to me the most stylish of the options out there. www.sun-glove.com  Best to you.
